response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This exceptional item boasts a multitude of features that are sure to enhance your daily life or business operations significantly. Given its unparalleled quality and functionality, we believe it is worth more than $12,000 to you. However, to make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This represents an excellent value considering the investment you will receive in return. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 15000}
